speaker: Restricted Stacks
lines: Shelves lean together in conspiracies; pages whisper.
Locks ask for passwords you remember from dreams.
A lantern refuses to smoke, as if ashamed to be seen here.
A chain across a desk rattles when you think about rule-bending.
Footprints made of dust turn a corner and end politely.
A clerk shaped like a shadow stamps a permit on air.
A sigil chalked on the floor dampens accidents and doubles intentions.
Somewhere below, a vault door listens for this room's decisions.

choices.text: Carry your permit toward the Forbidden Vault.
